meanings.definition: Relating to or composed in meter.
meanings.sent1: The poet used a metrical pattern in his verses.
meanings.sent2: The song had a beautiful metrical structure.
meanings.sent3: The metrical rhythm of the poem made it easy to dance to.
meanings.sent4: Her metrical composition flowed like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The metrical beat of the music echoed through the hall.

meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted a metrical analysis of the data.
meanings.sent2: The metrical precision of the clock was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The metrical measurements were so accurate, they surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His metrical sense of timing was impeccable.
meanings.sent5: The metrical rhythm of the dance captivated the audience.
